name: jsonfieldexplorer
description: Node.js tool to efficiently explore and list all field paths in a JSON object. Perfect for understanding complex JSON structures, it recursively analyzes JSON data to provide a clear summary of nested fields and arrays.

scripts.demo: npm run demo:enum && npm run demo:stats && npm run demo:complex
scripts.demo:enum: echo '--- Enum Detection Demo ---' && node index.js test/sample-enum.json
scripts.demo:stats: echo '--- Statistics Mode Demo ---' && node index.js --stats test/sample-stats.json
scripts.demo:complex: echo '--- Complex Structure Demo ---' && node index.js --max-depth 4 test/sample-complex.json
scripts.demo:all: echo '--- All Features Demo ---' && node index.js --stats --max-depth 3 test/sample-complex.json
scripts.demo:interactive: echo '--- Interactive Mode Demo ---' && echo 'Try: help, filter users, stats, search address, exit' && node index.js --interactive test/sample-complex.json

author: Chris Nilsson <christopher@synille.se>
